meanings.sent1: The recentest movie I watched was very exciting.
meanings.sent2: She always wears the recentest fashion trends.
meanings.sent3: I heard the recentest joke at the party, and it made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The recentest news about the weather caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent5: The recentest memory of my childhood is playing in the park with my friends.

meanings.definition: Most recent in time or order
meanings.sent1: The recentest event in history was the moon landing.
meanings.sent2: He completed the recentest task on his to-do list.
meanings.sent3: The recentest guest to arrive at the party brought a delicious cake.
meanings.sent4: Her recentest decision to change careers was a bold move.
meanings.sent5: The recentest addition to the team brought fresh ideas and energy.
